thread.title: Laurie Abraham

author: Laurie Abraham
title: Laurie Abraham
text: I am a teacher and these Fabletic choices really create style as well as comfort when sitting on a carpet reading to students or promoting physical activity on the playground. I never feel that I am giving up the look to go to work daily in comfort. This is a dress up or dress down style for the workplace and I love the feel of the fabric and it supports so well. Other fabrics from local retailers never keep their shape and I tug and pull at the outfits when I sit, stand, run, or engage in various positions in my own workout routines. With Fabletics, there is never an adjustment or any discomfort or self-consciousness when working out or at work. Way to go, Kate. I love your line!!
